Package com.athgri.finalproject.dtoController

Class FavoritesController

java.lang.Object
com.athgri.finalproject.dtoController.FavoritesController
@RestController @RequestMapping("api/favorites") public class FavoritesController extends Object
The FavoritesController class handles favorites-related API endpoints.

      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of favorites or a NOT_FOUND status if the list is empty

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/add/{id}/{itemId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addFavoriteById(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @PathVariable Long itemId)
      Adds a new favorites item ID to the specified user ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the user associated with the favorites
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing true if the item was added or false if the operation fails

    • deleteUserSession

      @CrossOrigin @DeleteMapping("/delete/{id}/{itemId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteUserSession(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @PathVariable Long itemId)
      Deletes a user session by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the user session to be deleted
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the result of the deletion operation
